Class LivingRat

java.lang.Object
GameObject
Rat
LivingRat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdultFemale, AdultIntersex, AdultMale, ChildRat
public abstract class LivingRat extends Rat
An abstract class which models any rat that isn't a death rat.
Version:
1.0
Author:
James McWilliams

  • Constructor Details

    • LivingRat

      public LivingRat(Controller controller, int speed, Rat.Direction direction, int gasTimer, int xPos, int yPos, boolean isFertile)
      LivingRat constructor.
      Parameters:
      speed - how fast the rat moves.
      direction - the direction the rat is facing.
      gasTimer - how long the rat has spent inside poison gas.
      xPos - where the rat is on the x-axis.
      yPos - where the rat is on the y-axis.
      isFertile - whether the rat can breed.
